title: Courgette omelette

ingredients.content: 20 g stale white bread, cut into pieces
60 g Parmesan cheese, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Line Varoma tray with baking paper, leaving some of the steaming holes uncovered then place in Varoma dish. Set aside.
Place bread, Parmesan and parsley in mixing bowl then chop <b>15 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add eggs and salt then mix <b>15 sec/speed 4<b>.
Add courgettes and spring onions then chop <b>4 sec/speed 4<b>. Pour mixture onto baking paper in Varoma tray.
Place water in mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position then cook <b>25 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Carefully, using the baking paper, remove omelette and transfer to a plate. Cut into pieces (4 cm x 4 cm) before serving warm or cold.

hintsAndTricks: For a different flavour, the parsley can be substituted with another herb (e.g. wild garlic, dill, chives or a mix of herbs).
Can be served as a starter or as a side dish with potatoes and salad.
